articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Chocolate prices to keep rising as West Africa’s cocoa crisis deepens - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Top growers in Ivory Coast and Ghana are facing catastrophic harvests, resulting in record-high cocoa prices.
articles.content: Long the worlds undisputed cocoa powerhouses, accounting for more than 60 percent of global supply, Ghana and its West African neighbour Ivory Coast are both facing catastrophic harvests this season.… [+2200 chars]

articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.title: Apple Will Have To ‘Rethink’ iPhone 16 Design After New Oregon Repair Law - Forbes
articles.description: Oregon's law goes further than other right-to-repair legislation in that it's the first to ban a practice called parts pairing.
articles.content: iPhone 15 Pro Max smartphones on display inside the Apple Inc. Puerta del Sol store on the first day ... [+] of sale of the iPhone 15 smartphone in Madrid, Spain, on Friday, Sept. 22, 2023. Apple's l… [+5689 chars]
